required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Versus Lymphadenectomy in Endometrial Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy Versus Pelvic Lymphadenectomy in Early Stage Endometrial Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: To compare sentinel lymph nodes biopsy versus comprehensive lymphadenectomy in patients with early stage endometrial cancer.

detailed_description.textblock: This retrospective study aims to compare sentinel lymph nodes biopsy versus comprehensive lymphadenectomy in patients with early stage endometrial cancer by reviewing the medical records.

primary_outcome.description: The length of time from the day of operation till recurrence or last follow up
The length of time from the day of operation till death (of any cause) or last follow up

secondary_outcome.measure: surgical complications related to lymph node biopsy or lymphadenectomy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the day of operation till post-operative 6 months

arm_group.description: woman who had sentinel lymph node mapping and biopsy
woman who underwent traditional pelvic lymphadenectomy without sentinel lymph node mapping

intervention.intervention_name: Sentinel lymph node mapping and biopsy
intervention.description: Sentinel lymph node mapping with indocyanine green dye followed by biopsy if positive

study_pop.textblock: Women aged 20 and above, diagnosed with early stage endometrial cancer (FIGO stage I), who had received staging surgery between 01 July 2017 and 19 August 2021 were included in the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- â‰§ 20 years
- early stage endometrial cancer (FIGO stage I)
Exclusion Criteria:
- Did not receive a complete course of treatment in this hospital, interrupted the treatment halfway (except if the disease continued to deteriorate or caused death during treatment), and did not follow up in this hospital after the course of treatment.

facility.name: Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Far-Eastern Memorial Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Chief of Department of Obstetrics & Gynecology
